name: quail
title: Quail: Dual-LM, High-Accuracy QA Text Summarizer
blurb: Get Answeres Directly from the Source. Hallucination-Lite.
points: Uses innovative, self-designed Dual-LM approach, as published in Paper for TREC iKAT (see Resume for Paper Details)
Uses BERT & T5 based Langague Models to Rank Passage Sentences by Relevance Then Summarize
React based web app that calls Flask/Python Based API to Exchange Summary Metadata
Uses a Redis-Based Jobs System to Handle Queries to Avoid GPU Overloading
Uses HuggingFace Transformers, PyTorch, and CUDA with a self-hosted worker
Uses Docker to host API and PM2 to run worker
